_header: My mourning M grieves me sore
Subjects: love letters; lovers, addresses to beloved
_description: A love letter to his mistress by Humfrey Newton — four quatrains

BodLatMisC66.First Lines:
Mi Mornynge M greues me soremy pay peynes lady be not to
                    layn…
BodLatMisC66.Last Lines:
…for you my morninge þus I madefor [sothe] I wold ye knew
                    my pay
BodLatMisC66.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Poems of Humphrey Newton, Esquire, 1466-1536.” 
             PMLA
         65 (1950): 249-81: 274.
